actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide grants for rural substance abuse treatment and education programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Substance Abuse Treatment and Education Act
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Rural Substance Abuse Treatment and Education Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Administrator of the Alcohol, Drug Abuse, and Mental Health Administration to establish a program to provide at least 100 grants to hospitals, community health centers, and chemical dependency treatment centers that serve non-metropolitan areas to assist such entities in developing projects that provide, or expand the availability of, chemical dependency treatment or education services. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Rural Substance Abuse Treatment and Education Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide grants for rural substance abuse treatment and education programs, and for other purposes.
